content.header: Asian Student Association's annual culture show
content.info: ASA's annual Culture Show featuring performances by different multicultural organizations around URI and Rhode Island.
content.info2: ASA’s most popular event is the ASA culture Show, which has been held at URI for 26 years. The culture show is a showcase of the talent within various multicultural organizations at URI.
content.info3: It features performances by ASA members, URI’s multicultural dance team as well as a different featured guest each year
